skills.name: Hammer Punch
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times and deals damage proportionate to your Defense. Each attack has a 25% chance to stun the enemy for 1 turn. If the target is not suffering any harmful effects, 1 additional attack is added.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +15%

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: Unleashes a devastating shout which has a 50% chance to provoke the enemy for 1 turn.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

skills.name: Twisted Senses (Passive)
skills.description: Becomes immune against Defense decreasing effects. Your Attack Bar is filled up by 30% each time you get hit by a Critical Hit. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.
